works.description:
My website content, a blog post about how to make Tibetan Butter Tea, is
copied, beginning with this phrase: "In Tibet, the process of making butter tea takes a long time and is pretty complicated" and continuing through the end of my recipe for butter tea.  On at least one of the URLs I'm reporting, the source is falsely attributed to the "China Tibet Tourism Bureau"  
It appears that one site (tibetantrip) originally copied my recipe — and then that article was in turn copied by others. Google has already removed a URL from tibetantrip  from searches (thanks!), but tibetantrip has now put a new page up with the same content.
